page.title: 03A day in the life of Angela
page.content: I am 10 years old and this is how I normally spend{a Saturday}or a day during the school holidays. I get up at 7.00am and get changed. Next{I do my mother's bingo game}in the newspaper, then clean out the budgie's cage and{watch some TV.}I go into the kitchen and make myself some toast and eat it in the living_room. When I have finished I brush my hair and get my coat on and{go to the shops for my mother. After I have done{the shopping}I go to my gran's and we go out and{do her {shopping.}When we come back{I bake a {cake with her}and then we go into the greenhouse and{plant some seeds. In the evening I{watch television until I go to bed.
